name: postscript
description: Syntax highlighting and live previews of PostScript/EPS files
author: John Gardner <gardnerjohng@gmail.com>

openInSplitPane.description: Open previewer in a split pane. If disabled, a new tab in the same pane is created.

alphaBits.title: Antialiasing level
alphaBits.description: Subsample antialiasing level. Lower values result in choppier but faster renders.

resolution.description: Resolution of rendered images, expressed in DPI.

command.title: Command name
command.description: GhostScript executable used by previewer. If blank, defaults to `gs` (POSIX) or `gswin64` (Windows). **Requires restart if changed.**
